content: to begin switch to smaller needles if desired working in the round being careful not to knit 3 rounds twist work a lateral braid as instructed previously work *ktbl p2* ribbing for 12 14 16 rnds or there are now 30 36 36 sts on needle 1 and to desired ribbing length 31 31 37 sts on needle 2 next round work *ktbl p2* ribbing until 4 sts leg remain in the round finally ktbl p1 p2tog there are now 30 36 36 sts on needle 1 and knit one round 30 30 36 sts on needle 2 work a lateral braid vikkel braid as follows work chart b row 1-9 a total of 2 2 3 please see technical tips for a video tutorial times and then work row 1-8 1-8 1-2 once on knitting a lateral braid chart b is repeated 10 11 12 times in each first m1l and slip the stitch back onto the round please note that the stitch count lhn increases temporarily for row 3 and 4 step 1 knit the second stitch on the lhn through the back loop behind the first stitch chart a do not slip either stitch off the lhn at this point tightening the st just worked to match your usual stitch gauge step 2 knit the first stitch on the lhn through the front loop leaving the stitch a bit looser than your usual stitch gauge and slip both sts off the lhn step 3 slip the first stitch on the rhn back onto the lhn repeat steps 1-3 until 1 unworked st remains in the round repeat steps 1 and 2 once more chart b chart key finally pick up an extra stitch underneath the m1l worked at the beginning of the round and place it onto needle 2 pass the last braid stitch the last stitch worked in step 2 now the penultimate st of needle 2 over the stitch just picked up there are now 30 36 36 sts on needle 1 and 31 31 37 sts on needle 2 knit one round karjalan neito socks page 2/5 gusset please see the written instructions for the twisted right and left lifted increases twisted lr1 and ll1 respectively at the end of the instructions you can use any other increase technique instead if you prefer use stitch markers to border charts c and d if desired work the established stitch pattern according to chart b across the first 19 sts of the round place m1 work chart c place m2 work the established stitch pattern according to chart b until 12 12 18 sts remain in the round place m3 work chart d place m4 work the established stitch pattern according to chart b to the end of the round work as described above until you have finished chart c and chart d row 26 26 32 remove markers chart d chart c chart key karjalan neito socks page 3/5 heel turn foot redistribute sts as
